file_content.text: Are you hurt? We came for you as soon as we heard what happened.
They had me sedated, but they didn't hurt me.
I'm fine, thank you.
Who are you people?
However long I was unconscious, it was way too long.
It's about time!
I couldn't agree more.
Myself and the others--the Wolf Baron freed us when you turned yourself in. Our first duty was to rescue you.
But the Thul army is on the march again--we need your help. General!
It is good to see you alive. Matters are moving quickly, and House Organa forces are in dire need of reinforcement.
You haven't won. The battle has already started. House Thul and the Empire will live forever....
So much blood. And it isn't over yet. General--report!
It is good to see you alive. The Thul army is on the move, and House Organa forces are in dire need of reinforcement.
What's House Thul up to now?
Status report?
I'm here to aid you.
I barely survived your last mission. Now you want my help again?
I've got my own problems.
I have few options but to ask.
The Empire has sent several Sith apprentices to support the Thul army. Organa soldiers are proving no match.
It may be true. My men are brave, but bravery will only take them so far.
We're used to fighting blasters, not the Force.
So long as the Sith are in place, we cannot win this battle. You must make a full assault on their war camps immediately.
You have my word: The Sith will not reach the Organa estate.
They won't win this.
It seems peace must wait.
If it's the only way.
Havoc Squad is ready to move out.
Understood, sir.
Full assault, sneak attack... results are what matter, right?
Uh, sure thing.
Understood. Proceed as you see best.
Assuming we win--then what?
What happens afterwards?
Those Sith are doomed.
Then we may yet prevail.
This is the greatest challenge House Organa has faced. If we win, Thul will be repelled and we can go on the offensive.
If we lose, House Organa will evacuate and go into exile. May the Force be with you.
May the Force be with us all, my friends.
Go. Save our house the way you saved us.
Attack! Fight for your freedom!
May you die and rot!
Impressive. The chance to see a Jedi in action... well, it makes this whole war seem worthwhile.
Impressive. The Sith keep insisting we shouldn't take Republic forces lightly--now I see why.
Impressive. A pity House Organa got to you before I did--Thul could use someone with your skills.
Impressive. You do House Organa proud--I can see how you managed to recapture the turrets.
I am Baron Jharkus Thul--better known as the Wolf Baron. Is the duke on his way, or did the old man send you in his place?
You said you had three hundred Organas prisoner.
Where are the hostages?
Indeed I do. Let me show you.
Organa is on his way. Don't worry about that.
The duke is coming.
Excellent. In the meantime, I have a show for you. Heronus?
Watch your tone.
I think you've misjudged your position. Heronus? Please put through our messenger.
My name is Brant Sonn. I am an eight-generation subject of House Organa.
My family, along with many others, was captured by House Thul. They're--treating us well.
Baron! What've you done with my people?
Keep your duke on a leash, please. The prisoners are in a very precarious situation.
I'm only going to tell you once: Free the captives. Now.
Let the hostages go.
We can talk about this.
You're not in such a good position yourself.
I can kill you at any time.
I wouldn't be so confident that you'd win a fight between us.
I have three hundred forty-eight prisoners. I am willing to make a trade.
I'll do it, Baron. House Organa isn't going to fall without me.
Ha! No. I want your friends--they will become my prisoners in exchange for the hostages.
Ha! No. I want your friend--she will become my prisoner in exchange for the hostages.
Ha! No. I want your friend--he will become my prisoner in exchange for the hostages.
What do you want me for?
Tell me why.
How do I know you'll hold up your end?
You could be lying.
He'll keep his word. House Thul doesn't want to lose its last shred of honor.
Thank you, my lord Duke.
Are you serious?
I'm very serious.
You're more useful to House Organa than the duke. If I can take you out of commission before the next battle, why not?
You can rest happily in our jails until the Republic ransoms you back--or you can have three hundred deaths on your conscience.
I'll turn myself in. Let the hostages go.
For their sake, I surrender.
You will not be forgotten. I swear it.
Use the gas. Keep them incapacitated until the transport is ready....
Use the gas. Keep her incapacitated until the transport is ready....
Use the gas. Keep him incapacitated until the transport is ready....
No movement for hours. We're secure.
What's that? By the entrance?
Attack! Destroy the Thul invaders and free the prisoners!
Attack! Destroy the Thul invaders and free the prisoner!
I won't do it. [Attack]
So be it. Heronus? Order the prisoners killed.
History will curse your name...!
Now you'll see why the Wolf Baron is Alderaan's supreme duelist....
You and I have no business together.
